item.description:
@Freedom3 wrote:

Well as you see this interface will NOT close. Here is a picture of it,

Now, here is the codeâ€¦

if (MAPTIMER == 0) { updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; IsAttackingNPC = false; closeInterface(); closeInterface(); closeInterface(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; shutdown = 1; resetAnimation(); RemoveAllWindows(); }
